name: bitbybit-core
description: Bit By Bit Developers Core CAD API to Program Geometry

scripts.build-p: npm run build && npm run copy-package && npm run copy-occt && npm run copy-readme && npm run delete-proprietary && npm run delete-tsdoc
scripts.build-occt: node generate-prod-build-yaml.js && cd bitbybit-dev-occt && docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd):/src" -u "$(id -u):$(id -g)" donalffons/opencascade.js bitbybit-dev-occt.yml && cd ../
scripts.build-occt-multithreaded: node generate-prod-build-yaml-multithreaded.js && cd bitbybit-dev-occt-multithreaded && docker run --rm -it -v "$(pwd):/src" -u "$(id -u):$(id -g)" donalffons/opencascade.js:multi-threaded bitbybit-dev-occt.yml && cd ../
scripts.docs: ./node_modules/.bin/sass ts-doc-theme/assets/css/main.sass ts-doc-theme/assets/css/main.css && node_modules/.bin/typedoc --out ts-api-docs/ lib/api --theme ./ts-doc-theme --excludePrivate --tsconfig lib/api/tsconfig.bbb.json --media assets/images/blockly-block-images/ && node mvdocpictures

author: Bit by bit developers
